title: Strengthening System Design Practical Competencies: Gamification-Based Adult Numeracy Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can apply basic math concepts (ratios, statistics, geometry) required for daily life and work with over 80% accuracy through project-based tasks
Learners can enhance math learning motivation by over 30% through gamification elements (points, levels, badges)
Learners submit over 90% of team project deliverables through collaborative problem-solving activities
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
